room_title: Escape room "WizardQuest" by Escape from St. Louis in St. Louis
room_description: You have tracked an evil wizard back to his lair, but he has once again slipped through your fingers and escaped!  While in his lair, you discover his plans to poison the river and destroy the kingdom.  You must find the antidote and re-create his transportation portal to stop him before it's too late!
